queries.query: SELECT TOP 2000 designation, ra, dec FROM TWOMASS.twomass_psc WHERE (ra BETWEEN 0 AND 0.5) AND (dec BETWEEN 0 AND 0.5)
SELECT TOP 2000 mainid AS designation, raj2000 AS ra, dej2000 AS dec FROM gavo.data WHERE (raj2000 BETWEEN 0 AND 0.5) AND (dej2000 BETWEEN 0 AND 0.5)
SELECT TOP 2000 designation, ra, dec  FROM gaia.tmass_original_valid WHERE (ra BETWEEN 0 AND 0.5) AND (dec BETWEEN 0 AND 0.5)
